summary: An inept music manager documents his attempt of bringing about a comeback of the 80s techno pioneers Fraktus, who in the past 30 years have disconnected both from each other and their music.
cast: Devid Striesow|Heinz Strunk|Rocko Schamoni|Jacques Palminger|Piet Fuchs|Alex Christensen|H.P. Baxxter|Dieter Meier|Jan Delay|Stephan Remmler|Matthias Schuster|Jürgen Laarmann|Steve Blame|Peter Illmann|Peter Urban|Hans Nieswandt|Westbam|Blixa Bargeld|Marusha|Jan Köppen|Helmut Geier|Anvil|Porky|Yasmin Allain|Willi Herren|Julia-Niharika Sen|Marcus Engelhardt|Kenny-David Baehr|Rafael Weitzel|Manuel Helbling|Margit Laue|Wolfgang Nissen|Anna Bederke|Hannes Hellmann|Felix Goeser|Katrin Pollitt|Jürgen Rißmann|Komi Togbonou|Pari Chopan|Vanessa Kicker|Renick Bernadina|Walter Löwenberg|Lotta Fuchs|Fred Fuchs|Lydia Ahrens|Klaus Maeck|Philipp Hartmann|Jan Peter Heyne|Jasmin Wagner|Julia Westlake
keywords: mockumentary|band name in title|reunion|music history|music group
director: Directors: Lars Jessen, Jacques Palminger (co-director) (as Studio Braun) | 3 more credits »
title: Fraktus - Das letzte Kapitel der Musikgeschichte
